arabic_text: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَيۡسَ بِي سَفَاهَةٞ وَلَٰكِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: He said, “O my people, there is no foolishness in me[23], but I am a messenger from the Lord of the worlds,
footnotes: [23] This calm, well-poised answer is a great example of how to deal with the ignorant.
